TopicTitle: Is There Going To Be A 23.1?

Articles.Content: One thing I noticed about 0.22 is that there was no '.22.1', despite the numerous bugs. As the time since 0.23 drags on, I'm starting to wonder if we'll get a repeat of that situation this time around. I don't want this. Don't get me wrong, it's a great update, and it's not like I'll stop playing KSP if there isn't one, it's just that it has a lot of bugs that could use a patch. If I can get an official dev statement on this, that would be great. Thanks!

Honestly, it's hard to tell. From what I know, a big part of Squad is on holiday, explaining why it drags on. We haven't had proper Devnote Tuesdays in the Daily Kerbal since KerbalKon for that reason, so I wouldn't be expecting an announcement soon.

If we're to get an announcement on this, it will neither be now nor here. I'd expect a dev blog about .24 and potential hotfixes to .23 when the team comes back from holiday but until then, I think closing this thread is best before it generates any rumors or spereads false information.

Thread locked.
